item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

9. Texture-less Text Rendering (9 points | 1 comment)
10. Nobody cares about decentralization until they do (34 points | 50 comments)
11. Seven Obscure Languages in Seven Weeks (22 points | 27 comments)
12. Unicode codepoints that expand or contract when case is changed in UTF-8 (7 points | no comments)

15. ISO/IEC 9899:2024 (9 points | 7 comments)
